input: user: Paint a portrait in words of a grand castle atop a hill.
output: Fortress of might doth stand on lofty eminence, amid the verdant vale so fair, amidst which hills with topmost points aspire to Heav'n's own sphere; its ramparts strong and watchful, warding within this fortress walls the secrets of the ages past; in halls and chambered courts it holds aloft tales untold. Upon a hill doth it ascend, whereon it shines amid sun-kiss'd realms, a noble sentinel; and from these heights it vieweth forth with steady gaze the cares of mortal days below.
